title: By the King. A proclamation, declaring his Majesties pleasure touching His royal coronation, and the solemnity thereof
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, 1660. At the King's Printing-House in Black-Friers.,
notes: In two settings; British Library copies have Steele notation: and Our; Harvard University Library copy has Steele notation: Solemn- ces.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library (Early English books, 1641-1700).
